snippet.title: Deceive Inc: Neon Nights - Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Agent Hans gets a rude awakening when the ex-henchman who cut off his arm comes out of retirement! With his days of villainy behind him, new agent Sasori aims to bring Deceive Inc. into the future of corporate espionage.

Update Highlights
NEW AGENT - Sasori is a tracker-type agent who introduces a new 

POISONED status effect. While POISONED, agents cannot spend intel or heal.

“Cyberpunk” Themed Season 2 Premium Catalog

First ever reactive weapon/gadget ink that reacts to your situation in-game
Improvements to the item spawn economy, HEAT SYSTEM, level cap, performance, and more! 

Rebalancing of agents to level the playing field even more
